p: The compositions of representative gas samples are listed in Table 3. The main ingredients of the gas are hydrocarbon (methane, ethane, propane, butane, pentane, and >C5), nitrogen, CO 2, and oxygen. Furthermore, 1.2–2.5 mg/kg H 2S is present in the gas. The ion concentration of representative condensate water is listed in Table 4. The main cations are Na +, K +, Ca 2+, Li +, and Mg 2+. The main anions are SO 4 2- and Cl -. The pH value of condensate water is 6.65. The operating pressure is approximately 11 MPa, and the temperature is in the range 41–45 °C. The normal flow is 3500, 38,400, and 120,000 m 3/d in the 2″, 4″, and 6″ pipelines, with corresponding flow rates of 1.1, 5.9, and 12.2 m/s, respectively.
